comment.author: Sarah
comment.text: Ok, let me get this straight. Whether it's Putin, anonymous, China or any other hacktivist that is sharing information with wiki leaks, Hillary basically admited in a non direct way that the information is correct but did a good job deflecting the attention by bringing up someone interfering with the election. No matter how the information is found, it shows how corrupt she is and how many lies she told. Donald needs to call her out on admitting the information being true. If she says the information isn't true, then call her out for lying about the hacking even happening because apparently the information is incorrect that is being put out there and the hacker apparently isn't good at their job. Who cares how her devious lies are found out, as long as they are found out and the truth is shared.

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: Exactly! Pretty much her "yes there were emails but don't worry because trump is friends with putin"

replies.author: Luke
replies.text: It would have been a prime time to bring up her personal server and all the emails she destroyed! He could have also zinged her on the whole toddlers killing eachother and others with guns....hmmmm....but she proudly supports PP!!!!

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: I was watching as she authenticated the wiki dump and he turned it about Putin.. I was so pissed

replies.author: Cherob
replies.text: Exactly! She successfully pivoted off of those facts and put him on the defensive about Russia. Donald or Sarah should have put her back on the spot about the FACTS that were released!
